name.ja: <ruby>帝<rt>てい</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>烈<rt>れっ</rt></ruby><ruby>旋<rt>せん</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: During a turn you have not Special Summoned a monster from the Extra Deck.

effect.en: Choose 1 monster on your opponent's field. This turn, if you would Tribute Summon a monster, you can Tribute that opponent's monster instead of 1 monster on your field. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Triumphant Return of the Monarchs
